scripts.android-alpha: cd android && fastlane android alpha && cd ..
scripts.android-build: cd android && fastlane android build && cd ..
scripts.android-build-apk: cd android && fastlane android build_apk && cd ..
scripts.android-clean: cd android && fastlane android clean && cd ..
scripts.android-hashkey: keytool -exportcert -alias mobile -keystore android/app/mobile.keystore | openssl sha1 -binary | openssl base64
scripts.codepush_android: yarn env production && source '.env' && appcenter codepush release-react -a $CODEPUSH_ANDROID_APP && yarn conf
scripts.codepush_android_production: yarn env production && source '.env' && appcenter codepush promote -a $CODEPUSH_ANDROID_APP -s Staging -d Production && yarn conf
scripts.codepush_history: source '.env' && echo Android && echo Staging && appcenter codepush deployment history Staging -a $CODEPUSH_ANDROID_APP && echo Production && appcenter codepush deployment history Production -a $CODEPUSH_ANDROID_APP && echo iOS && echo Staging && appcenter codepush deployment history Staging -a $CODEPUSH_IOS_APP && echo Production && appcenter codepush deployment history Production -a $CODEPUSH_IOS_APP
scripts.codepush_ios: yarn env production && source '.env' && appcenter codepush release-react -a $CODEPUSH_IOS_APP && yarn conf
scripts.codepush_ios_production: yarn env production && source '.env' && appcenter codepush promote -a tqt-apps/tqt-mobile-starter-kit-ios -s Staging -d Production && yarn conf
scripts.codepush_login: yarn env production && source '.env' && appcenter login --token $CODEPUSH_TOKEN && yarn conf
scripts.ios-build: cd ios && fastlane ios build && cd ..
scripts.ios-testflight: cd ios && fastlane ios beta && cd ..
scripts.postinstall: yarn patches && npx jetify && npx pod-install
